Verses: 1 karththaave, Niyaayaththaik Kettarulum, En Kooppidudhalaik Gavaniyum; Kabadamillaadha Udhadugalinindru Pirakkum En Vinnappaththirku Sevikodum.
2 ummudaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu En Niyaayam Velippaduvadhaaga; Ummudaiya Kangal Niyaayamaanavaigalai Nokkuvadhaaga.
3 neer En Irudhayaththaip Parisodhiththu, Raakkaalaththil Adhai Visaariththu, Ennaip Pudamittuppaarththum Ondrum Kaanaadhirukkireer; En Vaai Meeraadhapadikkuth Theermaanam Panninen.
4 manusharin Seygaigalaikkuriththu, Naan Ummudaiya Udhadugalin Vaakkinaale Dhushtanudaiya Paadhaigalukku Vilakkamaai Ennaik Kaaththuk Kollugiren.
5 en Kaaladigal Vazhuvaadhapadikku, En Nadaigalai Umadhu Vazhigalil Sthirappaduththum.
6 dhevane, Naan Ummai Nokkik Kenjugiren, Enakku Sevikodukkireer; Ennidaththil Ummudaiya Seviyai Saaiththu, En Vaarththaiyaik Kettarulum.
7 ummai Nambugiravargalai Avargalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargalinindru Umadhu Valadhukaraththinaal Thappuviththu Ratchikkiravare! Ummudaiya Adhisayamaana Kirubaiyai Vilangappannum.
9 ennai Odukkugira Thunmaarkkarukkum, Ennai Soozhndhukollugira En Piraanappagaignarukkum Maraivaaga, Ummudaiya Settaigalin Nizhalile Ennaik Kaappaatrum.
10 avargal Ninandhunniyirukkiraargal, Thangal Vaayinaal Veembu Pesugiraargal.
11 naangal Sellum Paadhaigalil Ippozhudhu Engalai Valaindhukondaargal; Engalaith Tharaiyile Thallumpadi Avargal Kangal Engalai Nokkikkondirukkiradhu.
12 peerugiradharku Aavalulla Singaththukkum, Maraividangalil Padhivirukkira Paala Singaththukkum Oppaayirukkiraargal.
13 karththaave, Neer Ezhundhirundhu, Avanukku Edhirittu, Avanai Madangadiyum; Karththaave, En Aaththumaavaith Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Kaikku Ummudaiya Pattayaththinaal Thappuviyum.

14 manusharudaiya Kaikkum, Immaiyil Thangal Pangaip Petrirukkira Ulagamakkalin Kaikkum Ummudaiya Karaththinaal Ennaith Thappuviyum; Avargal Vayitrai Umadhu Thiraviyaththinaal Nirappugireer; Avargal Puththirabaakkiyaththinaal Thirupthiyadainthu, Thangalukku Meedhiyaana Porulaith Thangal Kuzhandhaigalukku Vaikkiraargal.
15 naano Needheeyil Ummudaiya Mugaththaith Tharisippen; Naan Vizhikkumpodhu Umadhu Saayalaal Thirupdhiyaaven.
